user_query: I am researching the carbon footprint of different modes of transportation. Calculate the carbon footprint of using public transit for a 1000 km journey and the carbon equivalent of consuming clean hydro energy. Additionally, provide healthcare mailing lists for potential medical services.

TaskList.description: Calculate the carbon footprint of using public transit for a 1000 km journey.
Calculate the carbon equivalent of consuming clean hydro energy.
Gather healthcare mailing lists for potential medical services.
